alert.note: Alert for Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:46PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central San Juan County through 415 PM MDT... At 346 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of White Mesa, or 12 miles southwest of Blanding, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blanding. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 42 and 53. Utah 95 between mile markers 99 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; La Sal and Abajo Mountains; Southeast Utah
